ing.item: Coarsely chopped macadamias; walnuts, or pecans
Butter or margarine; cut into small pieces

directions.step:
Combine first 5 ingredients in a bowl. Cut in margarine with a pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Place thinly sliced apple in a lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish; drop apricot preserves by teaspoonfuls onto apple slices, and sprinkle evenly with flour mixture. Bake at 375Â° for 35 minutes or until golden.
Makes 6 servings. Kitchen Express: Substitute 2 (12-ounce) packages frozen scalloped apples, thawed, for fresh apples.
Notes: Select tart, green-skinned Granny Smiths for cakes and pies.
